item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

Im trying to implement full opening and closing functions for the doors on my server, doors.cfg or w/e is useless atleast on my server, maybe it wasnâ€™t added right or something idk, idc really but heres my beef

case 1534: int door = 0; if(door == 0) { ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, -1, 0); door = 1; }else{ ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, 0, 0); door = 0; } break;

is around about what im trying with, but it isnt working idk why if you could take a look at this and maybe give me some help that would just be terrific.
